data.text:
Summer, the sea, and training! 
Bus, continue forward towards our lodging! Go, go, go!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Summer, the sea, and training! 
<story>Bus, continue forward towards our lodging! Go, go, go!

data.text:
Our summer training has finally come. 
The bus moved forward, aiming for the sea.
data.processed:
<story>Our summer training has finally come. 
<story>The bus moved forward, aiming for the sea.

data.text:
Of course I am! After all, this summer is my big chance♪ 
With this training camp, I'll catch up to Prez in one go!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Of course I am! After all, this summer is my big chance♪ 
<story>With this training camp, I'll catch up to Prez in one go!

data.text:
And once I get strong, I'll surprise her! Then she'll 
praise me and pat me! Plus you'll be happy for me too!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>And once I get strong, I'll surprise her! Then she'll 
<story>praise me and pat me! Plus you'll be happy for me too!

data.text:
So when we get there, 
I'm going to train as hard as I can! But before then♪
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>So when we get there, 
<story>I'm going to train as hard as I can! But before then♪

data.text:
Let's sing a song. Excuse me, Guide Lady, can I 
borrow the mic? I'll show you what everyone's 
favorite Uma Musume can do♪
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Let's sing a song. Excuse me, Guide Lady, can I 
<story>borrow the mic? I'll show you what everyone's 
<story>favorite Uma Musume can do♪

data.text:
With the momentum of karaoke behind her, 
Tokai Teio's intensive summer training finally began.
data.processed:
<story>With the momentum of karaoke behind her, 
<story>Tokai Teio's intensive summer training finally began.

data.text:
Dashing across the sand is so easy! 
I feel like I can keep going forever!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Dashing across the sand is so easy! 
<story>I feel like I can keep going forever!

data.text:
Trainer, how was my form? You were 
watching, right? I'm counting on you, you know?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Trainer, how was my form? You were 
<story>watching, right? I'm counting on you, you know?

data.text:
Mountain slopes! They're so fun 'cause 
they're uneven! Let's skip up them!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Mountain slopes! They're so fun 'cause 
<story>they're uneven! Let's skip up them!

data.text:
You're coming too, right, Trainer? 
Training alone is just so boring! 
Let's get to the top and have dinner together!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>You're coming too, right, Trainer? 
<story>Training alone is just so boring! 
<story>Let's get to the top and have dinner together!

data.text:
Now that we're done running, let's play with fireworks! 
Look, Trainer! It's a pinwheel firework! Look at it spin!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Now that we're done running, let's play with fireworks! 
<story>Look, Trainer! It's a pinwheel firework! Look at it spin!

data.text: Ahahaha! I want to jump more! Just like this!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Ahahaha! I want to jump more! Just like this!

data.text: I did my best to keep up with Tokai Teio's intensity, but…
data.processed: <story>I did my best to keep up with Tokai Teio's intensity, but…

data.text:
It's morning! Let's do our best today! 
Whoo! Let's run together, then do 
some swimming, and then…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>It's morning! Let's do our best today! 
<story>Whoo! Let's run together, then do 
<story>some swimming, and then…

data.text: Huh? Trainer?! Trainer!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Huh? Trainer?! Trainer!!

data.text:
As I opened my eyes, I noticed 
that I was lying flat on a cold, wooden floor.
data.processed:
<story>As I opened my eyes, I noticed 
<story>that I was lying flat on a cold, wooden floor.

data.text:
Oh, Trainer, are you awake? 
You just suddenly fell. I was so surprised.
data.name: Tokai Teio

choices.text: How long have I been out?
How long have I been out?

data.processed:
<story>Oh, Trainer, are you awake? 
<story>You just suddenly fell. I was so surprised.

data.text:
About 30 minutes. But don't worry about my training! 
We'll be fine as long as we just get back 
into training. I'm so excited for more training♪
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>About 30 minutes. But don't worry about my training! 
<story>We'll be fine as long as we just get back 
<story>into training. I'm so excited for more training♪

data.text:
But why did you collapse? 
Have you not been getting enough sleep?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>But why did you collapse? 
<story>Have you not been getting enough sleep?

data.text:
Oh, I think I get it! You were so excited that you couldn't 
sleep, huh? Hehe, I didn't get much sleep either. 
I was up all night gaming…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Oh, I think I get it! You were so excited that you couldn't 
<story>sleep, huh? Hehe, I didn't get much sleep either. 
<story>I was up all night gaming…

data.text:
Hmm? Why are you so quiet? 
Oh, I bet it's 'cause I got it right! 
Ahaha! Staying in a new place is just so exciting!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Hmm? Why are you so quiet? 
<story>Oh, I bet it's 'cause I got it right! 
<story>Ahaha! Staying in a new place is just so exciting!

data.text:
Wait…? Trainer, were you always 
that excitable? Something feels off… wait!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Wait…? Trainer, were you always 
<story>that excitable? Something feels off… wait!

data.text:
Did you collapse because of me?! 
Was it 'cause I dragged you along so much…?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Did you collapse because of me?! 
<story>Was it 'cause I dragged you along so much…?

data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>………

data.text:
I knew it… you're not as strong as I am. 
Yet I still forced you to do so much training…
data.name: Tokai Teio

choices.text: Don't worry about it, let's go back to training…
choices.processed: <size=35>Don't worry about it, let's go back to training…</size>

choices.text: Don't worry about it, let's go back to training…
choices.processed: <size=35>Don't worry about it, let's go back to training…</size>

data.processed:
<story>I knew it… you're not as strong as I am. 
<story>Yet I still forced you to do so much training…

data.text: Trainer…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Trainer…

data.text:
There's no way I could let her take a day off. 
She's way too self-conscious, 
she'd be very upset if we were to do so.
data.processed:
<story>There's no way I could let her take a day off. 
<story>She's way too self-conscious, 
<story>she'd be very upset if we were to do so.

data.text: So I need to bear with this…
data.processed: <story>So I need to bear with this…

data.text: Trainer, I'm going to take today off…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Trainer, I'm going to take today off…

data.text:
Don't say "huh"! We're taking 
today off, got it?! No training, only rest!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Don't say "huh"! We're taking 
<story>today off, got it?! No training, only rest!

data.text:
You still look pale, so I'm not going to force you to 
push yourself. So it's decided. No more training today!
data.name: Tokai Teio

choices.text: But I need to help you catch up to the President…
choices.processed: <size=33>But I need to help you catch up to the President…</size>

data.processed:
<story>You still look pale, so I'm not going to force you to 
<story>push yourself. So it's decided. No more training today!

data.text:
Nngh… I may not be able to reach that goal 
as soon as I had thought, but that doesn't matter!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Nngh… I may not be able to reach that goal 
<story>as soon as I had thought, but that doesn't matter!

data.text:
Without you, I wouldn't be able to grow! 
Plus… it wouldn't be like me.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Without you, I wouldn't be able to grow! 
<story>Plus… it wouldn't be like me.

data.text:
I'm not sure how to put it, but I don't like the 
idea of not having you. That being said, Prez 
does train alone…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>I'm not sure how to put it, but I don't like the 
<story>idea of not having you. That being said, Prez 
<story>does train alone…

data.text: I want to move forward with everyone.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>I want to move forward with everyone.

data.text:
With the sounds of the cicadas 
surrounding us, Tokai Teio began her story.
data.processed:
<story>With the sounds of the cicadas 
<story>surrounding us, Tokai Teio began her story.

data.text:
I want to have fun. Of course I want to win, but 
I want to win in a cool way! A way that I can be 
proud of, and that I can be praised for.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>I want to have fun. Of course I want to win, but 
<story>I want to win in a cool way! A way that I can be 
<story>proud of, and that I can be praised for.

data.text:
I want to continue to be able to celebrate my victories with you, 
like we did at the arcade the other day. With you, and with 
my friends. But more than that…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>I want to continue to be able to celebrate my victories with you, 
<story>like we did at the arcade the other day. With you, and with 
<story>my friends. But more than that…

data.text:
I know that bad things might happen before we 
make it there. I may be unbeatable, but there 
are things that even I can't control.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>I know that bad things might happen before we 
<story>make it there. I may be unbeatable, but there 
<story>are things that even I can't control.

data.text:
Yeah, just like that one time. Remember how when 
I went overboard and hurt myself, you helped me 
out? Just like that.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, just like that one time. Remember how when 
<story>I went overboard and hurt myself, you helped me 
<story>out? Just like that.

data.text:
Prez may be able to do things on her own, 
but I have people that I can rely on.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Prez may be able to do things on her own, 
<story>but I have people that I can rely on.

data.text:
So without you, I'd be in a real bad spot. 
I wouldn't know what to do. So…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>So without you, I'd be in a real bad spot. 
<story>I wouldn't know what to do. So…

data.text:
Let's take today off. Ahem! Changing the 
schedule based on the situation is super 
important, Trainer-kun.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Let's take today off. Ahem! Changing the 
<story>schedule based on the situation is super 
<story>important, Trainer-kun.

data.text:
Ahaha, you remembered? This is payback♪ Now that 
you've collapsed from overwork, it's my turn to 
teach you a lesson!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha, you remembered? This is payback♪ Now that 
<story>you've collapsed from overwork, it's my turn to 
<story>teach you a lesson!

data.text: Ooh! Why don't I give you a massage?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Ooh! Why don't I give you a massage?

data.text: Tickle tickle tickle tickle tickle tickle!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Tickle tickle tickle tickle tickle tickle!

data.text: The two of us played around, joking and laughing. Then…
data.processed: <story>The two of us played around, joking and laughing. Then…

data.text:
Hey, Trainer. I'm fine with 
calling off training today, but in exchange…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Hey, Trainer. I'm fine with 
<story>calling off training today, but in exchange…

data.text:
Why don't we go to the summer festival together tonight? 
I bet we'll have a lot of fun. So how about it?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Why don't we go to the summer festival together tonight? 
<story>I bet we'll have a lot of fun. So how about it?

data.text:
Yay! It's a promise! Let's have a lot of fun, 
and eat a whole bunch of food!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Yay! It's a promise! Let's have a lot of fun, 
<story>and eat a whole bunch of food!

data.text:
Woah, it's so shiny and sparkly♪ Hey, Trainer! 
Let's go and buy some masks! Which one should I get?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Woah, it's so shiny and sparkly♪ Hey, Trainer! 
<story>Let's go and buy some masks! Which one should I get?

data.text:
Mister, I gimme two! I'll have that one! 
Yeah, the pink one please♪
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Mister, I gimme two! I'll have that one! 
<story>Yeah, the pink one please♪

data.text:
The sound of her joyous voice resounded through the night. 
She ran, played, and laughed throughout the night. And 
afterwards, she proceeded through the training, full speed ahead.
data.processed:
<story>The sound of her joyous voice resounded through the night. 
<story>She ran, played, and laughed throughout the night. And 
<story>afterwards, she proceeded through the training, full speed ahead.
